original_title: Sisqo: Twenty Four Hours with Sisqo
overview: Music & Musicals, Rap & Hip-Hop, Urban & Dance - After bursting onto the urban music scene as the lead singer of chart-topping R & B group Dru Hill, Sisqo cemented his status as a force in pop music with his debut solo release "Unleash the Dragon," and the irrepressible hit single "Thong Song." In this behind-the-scenes documentary, fans get a glimpse of what a day in the life of the diminutive superstar entails, from recording sessions to commercial shoots and much more.
title: Sisqo: Twenty Four Hours with Sisqo
